CardData.FlavorText:
<line-height=100%><size=200%>T</size>he Great River of Wilderland is a most welcome sight indeed, after countless hours spent slogging through the dank gloom of Mirkwood. Even with orcs in pursuit, eager to recapture Bilbo, you decide a short rest is called for. 
<indent=50></indent>The waters of the Anduin offer much-needed refreshment to your party. Even but a few minutes spent slaking your thirst gives you the energy to rally for the last leg of your journey.
